alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Southern Wheatland; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 1:06AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 9 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central, south central, and southeast Montana. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Expect snow to cause slick roads and areas of poor visibility. Travel could be very difficult, including on I-94 and US-12. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes today, as well as the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breezy northwest winds will produce areas of blowing snow and wind chills of 20 to 35 below zero Wednesday night and Thursday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Allow extra time to reach your destination. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Southern Wheatland; Treasure
